# Prepare Rock Saw

## ID

`
prepare_saw
`

## Requires


## Description

The saw is prepared by checking various aspects of the saw, motor and blade to ensure it has been properly maintained. 

## Procedure

- Clean the area around the saw. Ensure that there are no large pieces of rock that are in the saw tub or around the saw area.
- Wipe down the saw blade with a paper towel to remove an residual oil.
- Turn on water that lubricates the blade.
